inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed by NCI Laboratory of Pathology intra-cranial or spinal RELA-fusion ependymoma of grade I, II or III.
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma, not RELA-fusion ependymoma.

inclusion.criterion: Has received two or fewer prior chemotherapy regimens
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No information provided about number of prior chemotherapy regimens.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have an evidence of tumor progression.
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma, but no mention of tumor progression.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have had prior radiation therapy.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient received field radiation t10-l1 followed by CPT-11 Weekly x4 with Avastin Q2 weeks/ 2 weeks rest and repeat cycle.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be greater than or equal to 18 years old.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a Karnofsky performance status of greater than or equal to 60.
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No information provided about Karnofsky performance status.

inclusion.criterion: Adequate organ and marrow function as defined below:
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No information provided about organ and marrow function.

exclusion.criterion: Anticancer treatment within designated period of time before enrollment including: surgery within 14 days
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: Patient received radiation therapy, but no recent surgery mentioned.

exclusion.criterion: Treatment with any investigational agent within 28 days before enrollment.
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: No information provided about treatment with investigational agents.

exclusion.criterion: History of any other cancer (except non-melanoma skin cancer or carcinoma in-situ of the cervix), unless patient is in complete remission and off all therapy for that disease for a minimum of 3 years.
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: No information provided about history of other cancers.

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled intercurrent illness including, but not limited to, ongoing or active infection, symptomatic congestive heart failure, unstable angina pectoris, cardiac arrhythmia, or psychiatric illness/social situations that would limit compliance with study requirements.
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: No information provided about uncontrolled intercurrent illnesses.

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant women are excluded from this study because marizomib's potential for teratogenic or abortifacient effects is unknown.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: Patient is a 45-year-old man, no mention of pregnancy.

notes: Unknown number of prior chemotherapy regimens and Karnofsky performance status. No information provided about organ and marrow function or treatment with investigational agents.
